panels.description: Shows the number of finished build over time with their statuses (succeeded, failed, aborted & errored).
panels.title: Build Statuses

panels.description: Shows the number of builds started and finished over time.
panels.title: Total Builds (Finished-Started)

panels.description: Shows the number of resource checks done per team.
panels.title: Lidar Checks

panels.description: Shows the percentage of memory used (without counting cache) by the web instance.

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'web' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "host"

panels.title: Web Memory

panels.description: Shows the number of open files that belong to ATC.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") * 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'web' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "host"

panels.title: Web Open Files / Instance

panels.description: Shows the percentage of CPU usage in user space by each web instance.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") * 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'web' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "host"

panels.title: Average Web CPU

panels.description: Shows the transmission/receive rate of the web eth0 network interface.
panels.title: Web Network

panels.description: Shows the number of the current running go routines for the web instances.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") * 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'web' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "host"

panels.title: Web Goroutines

panels.description: Shows the response time of every call per possible route.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "http response time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "route"

panels.title: HTTP Response Duration

panels.description: The number of open database connections per ATC node for both api and backend connection pools.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "scheduling: loading versions duration (ms)" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"

panels.title: Web Database Connections

panels.description:
The number of queries that got created since the last time the metric was emitted.

Note: the emission interval is hardcoded to 10s.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("value"), 10s) FROM "database queries" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"

panels.title: Database Queries (1m)

panels.description: Shows the number of active containers per worker as reported by the garden server on the worker.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "worker containers" WHERE "bosh-deployment" = 'concourse-wings' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "worker"

panels.title: Total No. of Worker Containers

panels.description: Displays the disk utilization of `/var/vcap/data` for bosh jobs `worker`, `concourse`, and `untrusted-worker`.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") * 100 FROM "disk /var/vcap/data/baggageclaim/volumes" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'worker' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "tag", "host"

panels.title: Worker Disk Available %

panels.description: Shows the transmission/receive rate of the workers eth0 network interface.
panels.title: Average Worker Network (Tx/Rx)

panels.description: Shows the percentage of memory used (without counting cache) by the worker instances (per worker).

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'worker' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "host"
SELECT mean(value) * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'worker' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($dynamic), "host"

panels.title: Average Worker Memory

panels.description: Shows the number of active volumes per worker as reported by the baggageclaim server on the worker.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu" WHERE "bosh-job" = 'worker' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"

panels.title: No. of Worker Volumes / Team

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "containers created" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.description:
Shows: 
 - `worker containers.sum`: The number of containers reported by the worker on registration and on heartbeating.
 - `containers created.sum`: The number of created containers since the last metric emit as 
 - `failed containers.sum`: The number of containers that failed to be created since the last metric emit.
 - `containers deleted.sum`: The number of deleted containers after the last metric emit.

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "containers created" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Total No. of Containers
